title: pbe signups
body:
Im trying to sign up for the pbe client but it aint working...
Does anyone know why it doesnt work? My guess is that there is a time limit for when you can signt up.

replies.body: You may be attempting to sign up for the PBE via another region's URL, but need to use the one for EUW.  Log out entirely from the site.  You'll need to sign in from the[ EUW page](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/) first, then visit the[ PBE sign up](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).  Hope that helps!
